author: Universal Pictures
description:
M3GAN isn't following orders anymore. Calm, calculating, and deadly, she turns on her creators and makes her escape — and there's no turning her off now.

Buy/Rent M3GAN!

M3GAN follows a brilliant roboticist who designs a lifelike AI doll to protect her niece, but the creation develops a deadly sense of autonomy that spirals out of control.
